name: syster-meta
description: Syster - SysML v2 Parser and Tooling (Meta Repository). This is a meta-repository - each subdirectory is a git submodule with its own dependencies.

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Note: This is a meta-repo. Run npm install in individual submodules as needed.'
scripts.setup:packages: cd packages/diagram-core && bun install && cd ../diagram-ui && bun install
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:vscode-lsp && npm run setup:packages
